title: Van der Poel and Kopecky Out, Pogačar and Vollering Headline Strade Bianche Favorites
content:
Strade Bianche start lists: Kopecky, Van der Poel, Alaphilippe and Kuss steer clear of the white road Tuscan classic.

Read the full article at Van der Poel and Kopecky Out, Pogačar and Vollering Headline Strade Bianche Favorites on Velo.
